mosinstall.name: D4J TransMenu v1.3
mosinstall.author: DesignForJoomla.com
mosinstall.description:
D4J Transmenu Module allows to integrate to your Joomla website the navigation system with smooth sliding submenus. D4J Transmenu comes with huge amount of settings beginning from the submenu sliding direction setting and ending to the custom image for a menu item. One of the most distinctive feature is that you do not have to redefine appearance style for the menu, the module will automatically retrieve all the settings from your current template definition and apply them.

The core of D4J Transmenu is the famous "transmenu" javascript code original released from http://www.youngpup.net/2004/transmenus under the Creative Commons Attribution 2.0 license.

By using D4J Transmenu Module, you are going to bring to your website navigation menu new fresh look-n-feel.

For more information please take a visit to our website http://designforjoomla.com

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module table, this allows individual module styling

param.name: menutype
param.label: Menu Type
param.description: Which menu type to retrieve menu items

param.name: menu_style
param.label: Menu Style
param.description: Which way to display root-level menu items

param.name: show_placeholder
param.label: Show Placeholder
param.description: Whether or not to show the placeholder menu item?

param.name: root_placeholder_style
param.label: Root-level Placeholder CSS Class
param.description: If leave blank, will use '.mainlevel'

param.name: sub_placeholder_style
param.label: Sub-level Placeholder CSS Class
param.description: If leave blank, will use '.sublevel'

param.name: show_separator
param.label: Show Separator
param.description: Show a separator between root-level menu item?

param.name: separator_str
param.label: Separator String
param.description: A string of characters to use as separator

param.name: separator_img
param.label: Separator Image
param.description: Relative path or full URL to the image you want to use as separator

param.name: submenu_direction
param.label: Sub-menu Direction
param.description: The direction to display sub-menu (slide-out menu)

param.name: submenu_position
param.label: Sub-menu Position
param.description: The corner of the root-level menu item from which the sub-menu display

param.name: left_offset
param.label: Sub-menu Left Offset
param.description: Left offset of sub-menu from actuator (in pixel)

param.name: top_offset
param.label: Sub-menu Top Offset
param.description: Top offset of sub-menu from actuator (in pixel)

param.name: menu_padding
param.label: Menu Padding
param.description: Padding between menu border and items grid (in pixel)

param.name: item_padding
param.label: Item Padding
param.description: Additional padding around each item (in pixel)

param.name: dingbatSize
param.label: Dingbat Size
param.description: Size of the dingbat (square shape assumed)

param.name: hideDelay
param.label: Hide Delay
param.description: Number of milliseconds to wait before hiding a menu

param.name: slideTime
param.label: Slide Time
param.description: Number of milliseconds it takes to open and close a menu

param.name: shadowSize
param.label: Shadow Size
param.description: Size of shadow under menu

param.name: shadowOffset
param.label: Shadow Offset
param.description: Distance shadow should be offset from leading edge

param.name: shadowColor
param.label: Shadow Color
param.description: Color of the shadow, default is #888

param.name: shadow_opacity
param.label: Shadow Opacity
param.description: Opacity of the shadow, default is 40%

param.name: menu_background
param.label: Menu Background Color
param.description: Background color of the sub-menu

param.name: backgroundColor
param.label: Menu Background Color
param.description: Color of the background, default is #555

param.name: background_opacity
param.label: Menu Background Opacity
param.description: Opacity of the background, default is 80%

param.name: menu_image
param.label: Show Menu Image
param.description: Display selected image for every menu item

param.name: hide_menu_name
param.label: Hide Menu Name
param.description: Hide the name of menu item. If no image assigned, menu name will be show instead

param.name: menu_image_alignment
param.label: Menu Image Alignment
param.description: Alignment of the selected image for every menu item

param.name: menu_image_width
param.label: Menu Image Width
param.description: Width in pixel of the menu image

param.name: menu_image_height
param.label: Menu Image Height
param.description: Height in pixel of the menu image

param.name: menu_image_margin
param.label: Menu Image Margin
param.description: Margin in pixel of the menu image
